items.summary: Add the newly uploaded images "3801.png" and "Bg-02-17.jpg" as static frontend assets so they are publicly accessible via the website.

Update the Materials & Craftsmanship grid in frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx to remove the existing "Towel bag" card and replace it with a "Jute" bag card that uses the uploaded image "/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg" (update alt text to match the new image).

Update the Materials & Craftsmanship grid in frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx to remove the existing "Beaded Clutch" card and replace it with a "Black & White Canvas" bag card that uses the uploaded image "/assets/3801.png" (update alt text to match the new image).

Remove the "fashion model displaying diverse collection" and "close-up detail of premium fabric handbag" image boxes from the About section by updating frontend/src/components/About.tsx so those two images are no longer displayed.

Remove the "Elegant woman model showcasing premium fabric ladies handbag" image box from the Hero section by updating frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx so that model image is no longer displayed; keep the Hero section responsive and visually balanced after removal (e.g., allow a text-only hero on all breakpoints or replace with a non-model existing site image already in the project).
